html:
6.5.20  1:58 pm   What is your favourite kind of rice?

      amazing, fantastic rice

6.5.20  1:34 pm   can you give me a american city?

      how about oklahoma

6.5.20  1:19 pm   Did you make "It's gonna be alright" With someone?

     no

     if so, who?

6.5.20  1:08 pm   Hi Bill, I was wondering why some songs of yours are available on Spotify/etc. but many others are not. How do you decide which ones get to be?

      when i release a new song, if i am capable of getting it on spotify, it goes on spotify. so far that's been all of them since 2017

6.5.20  1:05 pm   On your songs page, are the dates when they were written or when they were recorded?

      recording entirely completed

6.5.20  12:39 pm   If a rock can be small, then how can a rock be big ???

      different perspective

6.5.20  12:31 pm   i still want to know what the bad thing is.

      could be a mad or glad thing

6.5.20  12:26 pm   According to 6.3.20  11:02 pm you were awake at a very late time, please go to bed sooner bill I'm worried about you

      that's actually a very early time

6.5.20  12:23 pm   What is the perfect Christmas gift?

      a new year

6.5.20  12:22 pm   Thoughts on shoes?

      if you see an unidentified object, it might be a shoe

6.5.20  12:14 pm   when are you posting a new song??? we all need one asap

      extremely soon

6.5.20  12:12 pm   Where do you think birds come from?

      other birds

6.5.20  12:06 pm   Is there a hobby that you would want to try but would be too difficult?

      knowing every language in the world

6.5.20  11:50 am   what's the achievement you're the most proud of?

      would prefer to achieve something new

6.5.20  11:31 am   how do you be cool

      must make up a new way

6.5.20  11:09 am   Can you run with your hands waving?

      as soon as i get all these influences sorted out

6.5.20  11:05 am   how can i learn math such as prime factorization? where did you

      that one i have figured out myself based on knowing what a prime number is. start by finding all of them starting at the beginning. then it will become like a neighborhood you can learn, which goes on forever

6.5.20  10:55 am   once theres a war between robots and humans, who will you  side with

      hopefully i can be some sort of liason, of peace

6.5.20  10:51 am   Whats a question?

      i'm not sure

6.5.20  10:46 am   How do you come up with those video ideas?

      ideas can be found deep beneath the earth's surface, which unfortunately i can't access, but i am pleased to report that there are also ideas everywhere upon the earth's surface

6.5.20  10:16 am   i don't get key changes.  they usually just sound like the performers were bored of the song so they had to change something in order to maintain interest.

     yes that happens sometimes, and when it feels like that i give them an 'F' (the F stands for 'effort')

       do you have an example of a song that couldn't have been as good without a key change?  

     of course

     or just examples of your songs with key changes?

     i have those too

6.5.20  10:15 am   what is a ceiling?

      the perfect christmas gift

6.5.20  10:14 am   Do you like rocks?

      they're ok

6.5.20  9:57 am   What is a good size?

      about 100 meters

6.5.20  8:11 am   How long does it take you to make a video? I would suppose a long time because of all of the animations.

      the bigger question at hand seems to be how long does it take to solve that problem

6.5.20  7:30 am   Quick, what is your opinion on blankets?

      hilarious

6.5.20  6:27 am   my friends and i are doing a challenge together where we randomly generated four notes and a time signature and have to write a song or piece based on them. i got 5/4 for my time signature. how to make 5/4 less scary?

     not decide the time signature before you come up with the song

6.5.20  6:06 am   will you be distributing your next songs and projects on a blue floppy disk with a piece of masking tape with the words written in Sharpe bill.W?

     might not be enough storage on a floppy disk

      If not may i suggest such a successful distribution system. Regards

6.5.20  5:11 am   How do you know when a project is good enough to publish/submit/share?

     it's always good enough but it could always be better

      I always want to keep revising things which leads me to never finishing at best and actively ruining something at worst. Also, I'm often put into situations where I need to submit the best of my work (like for contests, publications, or resumes) but I never know what the strongest pieces of my portfolio are. How do I figure that out?

     that's impossible too, if you are supposed to be the one who is in charge of making them good. once the thing is done, it would be too late to decide if it's good

6.5.20  5:07 am   What is the eighth day of the week?

      the first day of the next week

6.5.20  4:28 am   Do you still feel hope in the year of 2020?

      more than ever

6.5.20  4:03 am   One of your songs made me cry a little, are you proud?

      yes

6.5.20  3:44 am   Saying goodbye is not easy, how do I say goodbye without saying goodbye but also meaning goodbye because it will be the last time in a while I will see someone.

      try to just ignore that fact. pretend you are going to see them, anytime

6.5.20  3:27 am   how do you feel about crow's milk

      never heard of it

6.5.20  3:21 am   how do i prevent myself from destroying the entire world when i'm having a bad day/year?

      put all the destruction into a song instead

6.5.20  3:18 am   what can you tell me about the circle of fifths

      nothing you don't already know

6.5.20  2:46 am   Do you have an estimate on how much more time you need for the next song?

      should be 1 or 2 weeks per song, if all goes well

6.5.20  2:39 am   What's your thoughts on robot turtle spiders?

      my great ancestor is a robot turtle spider

6.5.20  2:37 am   How can you write such meaningless and random yet powerful and well put together lyrics?

      i think you may have stumbled upon the secret, which is to make them neither meaningless nor random

6.5.20  1:50 am   How are you so talented in both editing and making music?

      might have skipped some of the school field trips

6.5.20  1:31 am   how do i bend time and space more than i do right now?

      be even more honest to yourself

6.5.20  1:01 am   Weirdest superpower you have?

      fitting in to society very naturally

6.5.20  12:47 am   why do people say "sometimes Y" when saying their vowels

     because Y is sometimes used as a vowel

      what did Y do to deserve this

      being clever and versatile, thereby reaping the benefits (and higher pay grade) of being available as both a vowel and a consonant

6.5.20  12:40 am   how to use glitter?

      put it in the clouds. then wait until it rains glitter

6.5.20  12:31 am   When's the next video? Just give me an estimate.

      that's not as important as when the next 100 videos will be

6.4.20  11:30 pm   i am scared to sing but i love to sing but people say if you love it enough then fear doesn't matter. what do you think?

      well, i think the thing that really will make the fear go away is comfortability and familiarity. so basically just do it a lot

6.4.20  11:27 pm   do you like shrimp?

      too big

6.4.20  11:26 pm   i don't like music theory, so i ignore it and sing. do you like music theory?

      it's like a water park where you get to make up the entire water park

6.4.20  11:19 pm   Can you teach me how to play musical instruments?

      i will try

6.4.20  10:56 pm   What's your opinion on those moments where you realize everything is funny and crazy and the fact that we're just existing here on this rock without questioning it is just so funny?

      they're pretty good
